title: "Lisboa" sans
content:
Can anyone tell me what font is this?   
   
(the font on the site is aligned vertically, sorry)   
   
http://www.atl-turismolisboa.pt/business/images/maps/lisboa.gif   
   
thx in advance.
author: anarchitecton

comments.content:
i rotated it for you Tiago   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010185258im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12110.gif)

Looks custom-made to me. There's quite a few inconsistencies   
and type design rule "infringements" in there if I'm not mistaken.
